newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle trade slow at $66 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle trade slow at $66 - USDA.

text.p: Trade slow in the panhandle area Tuesday with slaughter steers and heifers not well tested, USDA Market News said. Top price $66 per cwt.

Feedlots reporting moderate inquiry from buyers with sales reported on 200 slaughter steers and 500 heifers; 18,500 head were confirmed for the week to date including 16,700 formulated cattle to be shipped this week.
Slaughter Steers: Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 66.00.
Slaughter Heifers: Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1100 lbs
66.00. Select, few Choice 2-3 1150 lbs 65.00. Pen Select, few Choice 2-4 1150- 1175 lbs including heiferettes 63.00.
Confirmed: 700, Week Ago: None, Year Ago: 300
Wk to date: 18,500, Week Ago: 7,900, Year Ago: 700.
